tests.name: returns expected API
tests.code:
test('returns expected API', () => {
    const target = createEventTarget(node);
    expect(target.node).toEqual(node);
    expect(Object.keys(target)).toMatchInlineSnapshot(`
      [
        "node",
        "blur",
        "click",
        "contextmenu",
        "error",
        "focus",
        "keydown",
        "keyup",
        "load",
        "pointercancel",
        "pointerdown",
        "pointerhover",
        "pointermove",
        "pointerover",
        "pointerout",
        "pointerup",
        "scroll",
        "select",
        "selectionchange",
        "tap",
        "virtualclick",
        "setBoundingClientRect",
      ]
    `);
  });
